channel.title: Community on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: How much is your ICY worth
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re excited to share a significant update about ICY’s value model. We’ve moved from a fixed USDC-backed system to a dynamic Bitcoin-backed model.

item.title: How to swap ICY to BTC
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Ready to convert your ICY to Bitcoin? We’ve made the process simple and secure. Let’s walk through it together. Getting started Before you begin, you’ll need two things: a Bitcoin (BTC) wallet to receive your funds and some ETH on the Base network for gas fees.

item.title: ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is ICY? ðŸ§Š ICY is our way of building a borderless software company through web3 technology. Since 2020, we’ve used ICY to create a culture where every contribution matters.

item.title: Dwarves Network Discord
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We know there are countless Discord servers out there. Ours aims to be different. From the start, we designed it as a space for developers, prioritizing genuine connection and knowledge sharing over corporate speak.

item.title: How to set up crypto wallet to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To withdraw ICY to Vietnam Bank or other fiat, you need set up 2 types of wallet in advance. On-chain wallet (Non-custodial wallet, such as: Coinbase, Metamask): This kind of wallet is needed to receive ICY and swap ICY to USDT.

item.title: How to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you can withdraw ICY, please make sure that you have already had the crypto wallet and Binance wallet. If you don’t have any, please follow this guideline.

item.title: Community bounty
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our Dwarves Discord network is the space where we connect with friends, alumni, and other like-minded developers. One way we encourage collaboration and skill growth is through bounties.

item.title: Dwarves tech radar program
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Dwarves tech radar program We use a tech radar to systematically assess and adopt new technologies. We constantly observe the tech landscape and place promising technologies onto the radar to evaluate their potential.

item.title: Sharing knowledge
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves Foundation, sharing is fundamental to our culture. We share frequently through public events, many of which are recorded for wider learning.

item.title: Showcase
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Showcase: sharing our work Every Friday afternoon, we gather on Discord for internal demos, our weekly showcase. This is where teams share what they’ve been building and learning.
